meanings.definition: A type of virus that causes herpes infections.
meanings.sent1: The herpesvirus spread quickly through the community.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are studying the herpesvirus to find a cure.
meanings.sent3: The herpesvirus decided to take a vacation in the tropics.

meanings.definition: Any of a family of DNA-containing viruses that includes the herpes simplex viruses and the varicella-zoster virus.
meanings.sent1: Scientists have identified different strains of the herpesvirus.
meanings.sent2: The herpesvirus family is known for causing various diseases.
meanings.sent3: At the family reunion, the herpesvirus was the life of the party.
meanings.sent4: The herpesvirus family tree branches out into different illnesses.
meanings.sent5: In the world of viruses, the herpesvirus family reigns supreme.
